website_summaries.verdict: Although the Puma Tazon 6 Fracture may look like a shoe that was designed for fashion and casual wear, its functionality was not neglected when it was conceptualized. It is a good-looking neutral road shoe but its façade is merely one-half of its usefulness. The other half is comprised of its features and functionality, making it a highly effective running and gym companion.
pros: Based on several reviews, the Puma Tazon 6 Fracture is a shoe that has a stylish and eye-catching design
Testers were glad to discover that the look of the shoe enabled it to be used for occasions and activities other than running
Most testers felt that the shoe is well-made and of high quality
Several testers commented on how comfortable the shoe felt when used for walking
The insoles were a pleasant addition to the cushioning system, said a few reviewers
Testers were very happy with the available color schemes
Most users were delighted at the effectiveness of the shoe as a cross-trainer
cons: According to a majority of testers, the shoe felt too small and narrow
Because of this, one tester opted to return his ordered pair
Reviewers noticed that the shoe felt uncomfortable when first worn
Apparently, it needed a week to be broken in, and that was too long a time for them
Several testers noticed that their feet easily got hot while wearing this shoe
One user’s opinion focused on the level of comfort from inside the shoe
He said that the in-shoe feel is not comfortable enough for long runs or half Marathons
The soles of the shoe felt thin, said a few testers
One of them experienced the sole coming off after he ran on rough terrain

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes i've purchased
customer_reviews.text: I am loving these shoes!!! I work 12 hour shifts at a hospital, and these are the most comfortable shoes i've purchased. I read many reviews that said to get one size larger than you normally would, and others that said the size listed is correct. In my opinion the size is pretty close to the the size of some other shoes I have. I would def. recommend them to someone on the hunt for awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson_G_86

customer_reviews.title: Almost great cross trainers
customer_reviews.text: well, they are well made, leather, look nice, comfortable. They are slightly more padded than the previous iteration which is nice for wearing them around but not so great when lifting weights. They are comfortable but billed as cross trainers but the heel is too narrow to make them great runners and the forefoot bereft of any protection or padding for running. If you are looking for a nice black shoe to wear around these would be it but for serious cross training they are not quite the shoe you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: robert m

customer_reviews.title: I really love Puma shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really love Puma shoes, as long as you are not using them for running. Going to the gym perfect, for everyday use, absolutely the best, feels good, fits just right, maybe a bit tight, but not too much, which is great for everyday use, but as I mentioned such fit is not comfortable for running, especially since it is fairly high and heavy shoe. But since I bough it to use as everyday shoe, I would definitely would buy same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Vidis

customer_reviews.title: and then these products are great. For the Frature one
customer_reviews.text: You really should remember that most PUMA shoes need to order half-size larger than your usual foot size, and then these products are great. For the Frature one, I found an outlet sold out all of this type, and then I ordered from Amazon even though it’s more expensive. Turns out, this pair is perfectly what I was looking for. The shoes have soft materials, and the outlook seems like $200 shoes. I would buy PUMA shoes in the future if they keep on producing products with this quality vs. price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not a sneaker buyer
customer_reviews.text: These are some nice sneakers and I cannot compare to many others since I don't often wear sneakers, but I'm really happy with these they seem to block moisture with a water resistant material yet they aren't noticeably too warm. I will get much use during most of the year with these. I have owned some Nikes classics that were good, and some Addams that were fine but both were border on uncomfortably tight, while these are comfortably snug with plenty support.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! I am really impressed with the look, quality and comfort. They fit as expected and provide plenty of support. My first time wearing them I wore them all day and had no aches or blisters. These are great for running, use in the gym, or casual activity.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna G.

customer_reviews.title: Good material but size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Good but the size runs small gave them to a friend , a little tight on me . And that's why I go to store to buy shoes these where my first pair bought online and the last. But these are good quality if it wasn't for being small all my shoes are 9.5 and these say 9.5 but looks like a 8 . So order one size bigger for a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were not comfortable. I have owned many puma shoes and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were not comfortable. I have owned many puma shoes and they felt much better than these. They rode up higher and rubbed on the side of ankle. The material definitely felt much cheaper than the puma shoes I have ordered in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Swanson

customer_reviews.title: No Toe Room
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it's small because of the m(I think means "medium") or not but I was happy to get my shoes. Put them on and my toes are squoozed together. No room to spread my toes. It seams narrow in the toes area. So I thought the show just needed to be worn and broken in. A week and a half later.....it's the same! Of course by that time, I can't return the shoes. I'm not mad. Just disappointed because the shoes look GOOD! I can only wear them a shirt time per day. 😔
customer_reviews.author: HubbySunshine

customer_reviews.title: One of the best pair of shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of these specific Puma's I have purchased. They are great, comfortable shoes. I wear them every single day for work. I walk miles a day for my job. I got over a year out of the last pair. I can still wear the old pair, they are just showing a lot of wear on the soles. But in terms of stitching and what not... they are completely in tact.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good Good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, the first time he wore them, he said his pinky toe was a little squished, but after a duple hours, he said they were perfect! I guess a little while of walking is needed to break them in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tlamb

customer_reviews.title: Decent tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected and is comfortable to wear. The shoes are breathable and great for running or sports in general. The only problem with the shoes was the sole which started to come off in a year or so. Otherwise, it is a 5 star worthy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Aritra Nath Kundu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & stylish. Suprisingly accomodates flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: These look & feel great! I'm also fortunate enough to have stumbled upon a pair that accommodates my flat feet. Unfortunately I've grabbed a pair that was too large. I'm hesitant on returning them due to said flat feet, but with enough consideration, I may if the situation is appropriate. If the smaller version fits perfectly, you can bet on 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi Ajilat

customer_reviews.title: Good all around!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I bought a second pair. Shock absorbing but still stable - better than the air cell models in my opinion. They soften up too much and are less stable. Plus these look good!

customer_reviews.title: Nice work shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore these all day at work and said they were very comfortable. I ordered a 10.5 initially and was able to exchange for an 11 with no problem. Both pair arrived quickly, very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: The tongue on the side at the front of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The tongue on the side at the front of the shoe does not lay flat. As a result it rubs on the top of my foot. This has not happened with the many pairs of shoes I bought before. Otherwise, a solid shoe for cross-training.

Before I buy them on Amazon I read the reviews saying to buy an extra size of what you normally use and I did exactly that ,I'm size 9.5 but I order them size 10 and they fit perfect. And the price on Amazon was awesome !!! I will keep buying this type of shoes for work.

They are very comfortable and stylish, and every-time I see the kitty emblem on them I smile a bit! When they eventually wear out, I will almost certainly buy them again.

The second pair I received were both very narrow and tight. They look decent but seem cheaply made, and from my experience very inconsistent. Wish Puma made these in real leather with better quality control.

He needed a pair of black shoes, and these shoes had a sleek design that I knew he'd love. He says they're the most comfortable shoes he owns. His shoe collection is almost entirely sneakers, so for these new Pumas to have taken the comfort crown is quite noteworthy.

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Tazon 6 Tazon 6 Fracture-m
product_meta.description: Padded collar and tongue for comfort. Lace-up closure for a snug and custom fit. T-toe construction. Midfoot saddle for optimum fit and comfort. Cushioned midsole. Breathable mesh lining and EcoOrthoLite sockliner for fit and comfort. EVA heel pod offers added cushioning and shock absorption. TPU shank for increased stability. Grippy rubber outsole. Imported. PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Fit and comfort with cushioned midsole and breathable mesh lining and EcoOrthoLite
Padded collar and tongue for comfort
Added cushioning and shock absorption using EVA heel pod.
